1.「それ以上 近寄らんといて……。| 大丈夫や。大丈夫やから……。: Don't come any closer. Oh... It's okay.

6.「ヨイちゃんのことが 気になって| こっそり 後をつけてきたの。| 何もなかった: I was worried about you, so I followed you|secretly. I was going to leave right away if|nothing happened.

7.「でも 苦しそうなヨイちゃんを見ていたら| いてもたっても いられなくなって……: But I was looking at Yoi, who seemed to be suffering| I just couldn't stay away

11.「テンジョウ チジョウ オボロゲナル| ハザマヨリウマレシ モウリョウヲ| ハラ: Tenjo chijo oborogenaru hazama yori umareshi|mouriou wo haraiitamai kyometamae!

13.「アァァァァ！| ヵラダを ヵラダをヨコセェェェ！！: Aaaaah! Get me Karada! Get me Karada!

17.「欲していた身体ではないが…… まァよい。| これも なかなか悪くない。陰衆 積:
Not the body I wanted, but... I don't|know... That's pretty bad, too. You've been|holding a grudge for a long time. I'll take|
|your place.

18.「遠からず この身体を 完全に我が物とする。| その時を せいぜ……い 楽しみに:
In a very short time, I will own this body|completely. And when I do... I'm looking|forward to it. Weak chieftain of the|
|underworld.

19.「うそや……。| なんで こんなことに……。: No way. How did this happen?

20.「自分の中でうごめく 何者かが| ウチの身体を狙ってるんは わかってた。| せや: I can't understand that there's something|inside me that's trying to get to me. So I|thought I'd do something about it and...

21.「ほんで <pc>に相談しようとしたんや。| せやのに なんで よりによって ア: Then I tried to talk to <pc>.|So why, of all people, would Asahi protect|us and let this happen?

22.「ウチの中から出てきた何者か……アイツは| 陰衆の積年の怨念が どうとか言うてた: Something came out of our house... He said|something about a long-held grudge. Maybe|it's something to do with the Yinshu's past.

23.「ちょうど ウチのばあちゃんが王都勤めの陰衆の| 巡察のために カミハルムイに: My grandma just came to Kamikhalmuy to|patrol with the royal family. Grandma would|know something.

24.「なぁ。王都カミハルムイ南の 宿屋の２階に| 来てくれへんやろか？ 一緒に ばあ:
Hey. Could you come to the second floor of|the inn in the south of Kamiharmoui, please?|We'll go with her and ask her how to rescue|
|Asaaki.

26.「この奥に 先々代の陰衆の頭領……| サヨばあちゃんが おるはずや。: Behind here, the chieftain of the shadowy|clan of the previous generation... Grandma|Sayo is here.

27.「陰衆の長老 サヨおばあさま。| ご挨拶が 遅うなり 申し訳ありません。| 今代: Aunt Sayo, the elder of the Yinshu. I'm|sorry it's taken me so long to get here.|This is our new chieftain, Yoyo.

28.「あらまぁ。| ずいぶん 懐かしい声やこと。: Ah. It's a long time ago.

29.「久しぶりに 孫に会える思うて| 楽しみにしとったんよ。| さぞや お仕事が は: I'm looking forward to seeing my grandson|for the first time in a long time. I bet|you're getting along just fine, aren't you?

30.「私は ロクに挨拶にも 来いひん| そんな礼節も わきまえないような子に| しつ: I have no idea what it's like to be a child|who has no sense of decency, who doesn't|even know how to say hello.

31.「ごめんて サヨばあちゃん。| すぐ 来るつもりやってんけど……| ちょっと 困: Sorry, Grandma Sayo. I was going to come|over soon, but... I'm afraid I'm in a bit of|trouble.

32.「……はて。じつの祖母に 挨拶にくるよりも| 優先せな あかんこととは| いった: ... What could possibly be more important|than coming to say hello to my grandmother?

34.「ウチの影から おぞましい魔物が生まれて| アサヒが アサヒの身体が……| 魔物: A horrifying monster was born from the|shadows of our house, and Asahi... The demon|has taken over...

35.「アサヒやて？| あの小憎たらしい 陽衆の娘のことかえ？: Asahi? You mean that hateful little Yangshu|girl?

36.「……そうや。 | 魔物は 陰衆の積年の怨念がどうとか言うてた。| 何か 陰衆に:
.... The demon said something about a long-|standing grudge against the Yinshu. I think|it might have something to do with the|
|Yinshu.

37.「ばあちゃん。アサヒを助ける方法を| 知っとったら 教えてくれへん？: Oh. If you know how to help Asahi, would you|please tell me?

38.「ずいぶん その陽衆のアサヒとやらと| 仲良うしてはるようやねえ？ 落陽の草原で:
You seem to be getting along pretty well|with this sun goddess, Asahi, don't you? I|saw them together in the meadow in the|
|setting sun.

39.「あんな陽衆の小娘と つるんでからに。| ……しまいには その陽衆を 助けたいや: Hanging out with that yo-yo girl... ... And|then she wants to help them? If you'd just|let it go...

40.「そやかて あの魔物は ウチから生まれたんや。| ほっとけるわけないやん。それに: That's right. That monster came from us. We|can't just leave him. Besides, we don't know|what kind of misfortune he'll bring.

41.「ばあちゃん お願いします。この通りや。| どないなことでもええ。あの魔物につい: Grandma, please. This... What's going on? If|you know anything about that monster... tell|us.

42.「……そんなもん 知りまへんわ。| せやけど……: ... I don't know anything about that. I|don't, but...

43.「確かに その魔物っちゅうんのを放っておくのは| 危険やね。ほんなら そんなもの: It's true that it's dangerous to leave that|monster unattended. Then why don't you just|bury her with the rest of us?

44.「ヨイ。ええか？ これは 因果や。| あの小娘が これまで陰衆をコケにしてきた|: Yoi. Yeah? This is... That little bitch has|been mocking us for years.

45.「そんなことあらへん！ これからは陽衆と陰衆が| 手を取りあっていこうって 和解: No, it's not! From now on, the yang and the|yin will work hand in hand and make peace.|You know that, don't you, Grandma?

46.「だまらっしゃい！ 私は そないなこと| 許した覚えは ありまへん。我ら陰衆の祖: Stop it! I never forgave you for that. I|don't know how much our ancestors felt|frustrated...

47.「……とにかく。お前が やらんって言うなら | 私が 災いを 止めるしかありまへ: ... And ... If you won't do it, then I'll|have to stop the plague. It's too hard on|the old man.

50.「<pc>…… どないしよ？| いったん 陽衆の隠れ家に戻ろか……。: <pc>... What do we do? Let's go|back to the yang shuang shuang.

51.「<cs_pchero> お待たせ。| 天地の儀をおこなう 覚悟は できとる。: <cs_pchero> Oh. Are you prepared to|perform the rites of heaven and earth?

52.「せやけど 知っての通り 天地の儀は| 儀式をおこなう ふたりの心……| 陰と陽:
But as you know, in the Heaven and Earth|ceremony, the two minds that perform the|ritual... The yin and the yang must become|
|one in order to succeed.

With the Yang Chieftain, Asashi, gone, the|only person who can take his place is the|... You are the only other|
|person who can do it.

54.「ウチも <cs_pchero>となら | 心を ひとつにできると 思うとる。|: I think we can be of one mind with|<cs_pchero>. What do you think? Will|you perform the ritual with me?<yesno><close>

55.「……いけずなこと 言わんといて。| これは アサヒを救うためにも 必要なんや。: ... Don't say something bad. We need this to|save Asahi. Will you perform the ritual with|us?<yesno><close>

57.「ウチが 呪文を唱えるから <cs_pchero>は| それに合わせて 祈ってて: We'll cast the spell, and the|<cs_pchero> will just pray along with|it. All right, let's get started.

61.<center>我が名は テンオツ貴人……。|あまつちに 和を もたらす者。: My name is Tenotsu Nobleman. I have a|harmony with the world.

62.<center>芽吹く花々。空は光り輝き。|水は流れ めぐりゆく。|とどこおりな: Budding. The sky is light. Water flows. All|is harmony.

63.<center>我を呼び覚ませし 陰衆の頭領よ……|汝は 我に 何を求めるのか？: Awaken me, chieftain of the underworld...|What do you want from me? If you want to|help, be prepared to pay for it.

65.「コイツらを 倒さんと| 話を 聞いてもらえんようやね。| 行くで <cs_pc: We've got to take these guys down before|they'll listen to us. Let's go,|<cs_pchero>.

66.<center>我が獣たちを しりぞけるか……。|話を聞こう 陰衆の頭領よ。: My beasts must flinch. Let's hear what the|shadows have to say.

67.「ウチから 生まれた魔物のせいで| 陽衆の頭領である アサヒが| 身体を のっと: The demon that was born from our home has|taken over the body of Asahi, the chieftain|of the Yangshu.

68.「大幻魔 テンオツ貴人さまなら| 何か 彼女を救う方法を ご存じかと考え| 恐れ:
I thought that you, the great phantom|Tenotsu Nobuhito, might have some way to|save her, so I humbly ask for your help in|
|this matter.

69.<center>強き闇を制するには 強き心が必要。|闇を御しきれぬ者は|やがて: A strong heart to conquer a strong darkness.|He who cannot control the darkness will soon|lose control of himself.

70.<center>闇の名は…… 陰果の罪業。|陰衆が紡いできた因果は 未熟な頭領が:
The name of the darkness is... Yin-Kung. The|cause and effect spun by the Inshu is too|heavy for an inexperienced chieftain to bear|
|alone.

71.「陰果の罪業……。| それは 陰衆の頭領であるウチが 弱いから| この事態を 招:
The sinful deeds of Yin-Kung. Does that mean|that this situation was brought about|because we, the chieftains of the Yinchu,|
|are weak?

72.<center>無論 かつての天地雷鳴士の歴史にも|同じような 変事はあった。|:
Of course, in the history of the former|Tenchi Raimusha, similar anomalies have|occurred. A chieftain who cannot control the|
|darkness is a disaster to the world.

73.「そないなこと……。| ウチは どないしたら ええんでしょうか？: That's what I'm talking about. What should|we do?

74.<center>……なすべきは ひとつ。|かつての天地雷鳴士が 災いを食い止めた: ... What needs to be done... Find the secret|of the former Thunderbolter who stopped the|disaster.

75.「すべては ウチの弱さが 招いたこと？| ウチ もしかして まだ| 心の奥底では: Was it all brought on by our weakness? I|wonder if deep down I still have feelings|for Asahi...?

76.「ううん。今は 迷ってるヒマやない。| ウチが どうにかせんと アサヒは……。: . I don't have time to wonder right now. We|have to do something. Asahi will...

77.「そのためにも テンオツ貴人が言うてた| かつての天地雷鳴士が 使ったという|: To do so, we must find the secret technique|that Tenotsu Takamito said was used by the|former Tenchi Raiyusha.

78.「ウチが探しておくから <cs_pchero>は| それまで 身体を 休めといて: We'll find you a <cs_pchero>, but in|the meantime, rest your body.

79.「それから ここまで 協力してくれた礼や。| 遠慮せんと 受け取っとき。: And now, help me out here. Don't be shy.|I'll take it.

80.「また 何か進展があったら| <cs_pchero>を 呼ぶさかい。| その時は: If we make any more progress, we'll call|<cs_pchero>. I will lend my help then.
